mapper.insert:
insert into T_DEPOSIT_ORDER(
DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO,
MEMBER_NO, DEPOSIT_AMOUNT, PAYABLE_AMOUNT, PAY_STATUS, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_FLOW_NO, PART_TRADE_FLOW_NO, PAYMENT_TIME, REMAIN_AMOUNT, DEDUCTED_AMOUNT, REFUND_AMOUNT, FROZEN_AMOUNT, IS_AVAILABLE, ADDR_REGION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, OPERATOR_TYPE, OPERATOR_ID ) values (
#{depositOrderNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
#{memberNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{depositAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{payableAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{payStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{paymentMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{paymentFlowNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{paymentFlowNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{partTradeFlowNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{remainAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{deductedAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{frozenAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{isAvailable,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{addrRegion,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{operatorType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{operatorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update t_deposit_order
MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
DEPOSIT_AMOUNT=#{depositAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
PAYABLE_AMOUNT=#{payableAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
PAY_STATUS=#{payStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT},
PAYMENT_METHOD=#{paymentMethod,jdbcType = TINYINT},
PAYMENT_FLOW_NO=#{paymentFlowNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
PART_TRADE_FLOW_NO=#{partTradeFlowNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_TIME=#{paymentTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
REMAIN_AMOUNT=#{remainAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
DEDUCTED_AMOUNT=#{deductedAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
REFUND_AMOUNT=#{refundAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
FROZEN_AMOUNT=#{frozenAmount,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
IS_AVAILABLE=#{isAvailable,jdbcType = TINYINT},
ADDR_REGION=#{addrRegion,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR_TYPE=#{operatorType,jdbcType = TINYINT},
OPERATOR_ID=#{operatorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
AND DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO=#{depositOrderNo}
mapper.select:
select sum(REMAIN_AMOUNT) from t_deposit_order
MEMBER_NO=#{0} and IS_AVAILABLE=1 and PAY_STATUS=1

select from t_deposit_order
MEMBER_NO=#{0} and IS_AVAILABLE=1 and PAY_STATUS=1

select MEMBER_NO as memberNo,SUM(DEPOSIT_AMOUNT) as depositAmount,SUM(DEDUCTED_AMOUNT) as deductedAmount,SUM(REMAIN_AMOUNT) as remainAmount,SUM(FROZEN_AMOUNT) as frozenAmount, SUM(REMAIN_AMOUNT-FROZEN_AMOUNT) as availableAmount from t_deposit_order where MEMBER_NO=#{0} and IS_AVAILABLE=1 and PAY_STATUS=1 AND REMAIN_AMOUNT > 0.0
select from t_deposit_order where MEMBER_NO=#{0} and IS_AVAILABLE=1 and PAY_STATUS=1 and REMAIN_AMOUNT > 0.0 order by create_time asc limit 0,1

select from t_deposit_order
MEMBER_NO=#{0} and IS_AVAILABLE=1 and PAY_STATUS=1 AND REMAIN_AMOUNT > 0.0 AND REMAIN_AMOUNT - FROZEN_AMOUNT> 0.0

select from t_deposit_order
order by PAYMENT_TIME desc

select date_format(PAYMENT_TIME,'%m-%d') as date, count(MEMBER_NO) as num from t_deposit_order where PAYMENT_TIME>=date_format(date_add(now(), interval -100 day),'%Y-%m-%d') group by date_format(PAYMENT_TIME,'%m-%d')

/*押金缴纳列表，就把会员名、手机号、缴纳方式、押金金额、缴纳时间、退款状态、退款时间、退款金额、退款方式*/ SELECT m.MEMBER_NAME as memberName, m.MOBILE_PHONE as mobilePhone, d.PAYMENT_METHOD as paymentMethod, d.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT as depositAmount, d.PAYMENT_TIME as paymentTime, r.REFUND_STATUS as refundStatus, r.REFUND_TIME as refundTime, r.REFUND_AMOUNT as refundAmount, r.REFUND_METHOD as refundMethod FROM t_deposit_order d LEFT JOIN t_deposit_refund r ON d.DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO = r.DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_member m ON d.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
order by d.create_time desc LIMIT #{rowIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_deposit_order d LEFT JOIN t_deposit_refund r ON d.DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO = r.DEPOSIT_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN t_member m ON d.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
